title: Kindred Release Date???
body: Does anyone know the release date for kindred , some people are saying after worlds but i don't know what to believe ! Im so confused !?

replies.body: Hopefully early next week with 5.20 (odds seem high, always the risk of unknown bugs cropping up with patches though).
The notes said 14th of October it will be released , is kindred going to be released right with the patch or abit after ?
